nodes.text: A containment chair was a device used by bounty hunters to secure captives. The independent bounty hunter and former Sith apprentice Asajj Ventress was known to store several containment chairs aboard the Banshee during the Clone Wars. During a mission to rescue Marg Krim's family, Ventress secured Vram and Laalee in two containment chairs to prevent them from accidentally damaging her starship while she and Quinlan Vos went to rescue their mother Tezzka Krim.
